Name: A Free Meal?
Description: Defeat Tacet Discords for rewards? Talk about a real free meal! Join Patroller Minghu, apply and secure your spot!
QuestDesc: Defeat Tacet Discords for rewards? Talk about a real free meal! Join Patroller Minghu, apply and secure your spot!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jovial Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, friend, I can see you've got some skills. Want to give it a shot?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jovial Patroller
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, it might be a little risky, but, you know, fortune favors the bold!

Options.PlotLineKey: If that's the case, why don't you do it yourself?

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Honestly, I just switched from logistics, so I'm not great with this stuff... Oh, by the way, I'm Minghu. Nice to meet you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So I have no choice but ask for help. Anyway, as long as I can get it done, it doesn't matter much if I'm the one doing it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I admire your courage!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See those Sound Dampeners? They were damaged by TDs in the last onslaught.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: First, we gotta fix up these three Sound Dampeners, then activate them to take down the TDs that are drawn in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's been a while since they got damaged. There might be quite a few TDs to deal with, but I'm sure you can handle them well!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great! Give me your name, phone number, and details about your weapon. I'll assess it and get you registered.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, huh? That's a good name. Unique and impressive!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've also got a good weapon. That should do the trick...

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, assessment passed! Let's dive right in!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fantastic! I knew you had talent! The job's done perfectly!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To be honest, fixing those Sound Dampeners is pretty challenging. I've tried getting help from others before, and none of them succeeded...

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, take your payment. Thanks to you, I can wrap up this job nicely now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Next time I run into something tricky, I hope you'll lend me a hand again! Thanks in advance!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, no worries. It's pretty challenging. Even divine power can't nail it in one go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe you're a bit off today. It happens to everyone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I still have confidence in you. When you're feeling better, you should give it another shot!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll be right here waiting for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back again! Ready to fix those Sound Dampeners and tackle the TDs? Awesome!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you ready? We can start whenever you're ready.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, let's get started.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, just take your time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seems like you need to connect these circuits to repair this Sound Dampener.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All those twisted circuits are making me dizzy, and my head's starting to ache.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Maybe you can try linking the circuits with the same color.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fantastic! All fixed! You're pretty sharp, huh? Didn't take you long to get them all sorted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Sound Dampener's activated!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once activated, it'll attract a big wave of TDs. Be careful!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Next one is in the southeast corner...

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oops, its sensing modules seem to be missing. You need to find them first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Once you find them, slot them in, and that should do real nice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good job! They're all in place. Didn't realize you were so good at finding stuff.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, the Sound Dampener's activated.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Finally, the one in the southwest corner.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just push those suspended blocks into the corresponding pedestals, and that should do the trick.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fantastic! It works!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Sound Dampener's activated. Take down the last wave of TDs!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, is it {PlayerName}? Mayday! Mayday! Help me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Somehow, we've detected a large wave of TDs appearing in the nearby area!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't handle them alone, so I need your help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry, but can you come here as soon as possible? It's really urgent.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll pay you twice as much as yesterday!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since the day I joined the Patroller, I've resolved to sacrifice my life rather than shy away from my responsibilities.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So when there's a situation beyond my ability, I have no choice but to hire someone to help me. I must fulfill my responsibilities!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, just come as quickly as possible. I sent the coordinates to your Terminal!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank goodness, you've finally arrived!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's hurry up. I've brought the car over, and we'll drive it to the destination.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This one. Get in the car!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you were about to get in, a sudden dull pain hit the back of your head. Your consciousness gradually faded away, and you passed out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, honestly, I'm more comfortable in this outfit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fantastic! Now we have time to get to know each other better. Let me reintroduce myself. I'm Xiaojue, an Exile.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was just out looking for my missing friends, but then I got lured by a high-paying job and ended up here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, thinking back, it was obviously a fraud! How could one earn such a huge sum just by killing some TDs! I was blinded by greed and got carried away...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I was caught by the red-clothed, and they confiscated all the money I earned from that TD-killing job... They even took away my savings!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it's not all that bad. When I got here, I stumbled upon the weapons my friends used to carry around.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know, us Exiles always keep our weapons handy, unless something unexpected happens. So the moment I spotted my friends' weapons, I knew they must be here. To save them, I had to...

Options.PlotLineKey: So you ended up becoming their accomplice?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Calm down, calm down. If I hadn't done this, I wouldn't have gained their trust, and I wouldn't be able to save my friends.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So I joined them, attempting to earn their trust. Fortunately, I'm pretty smooth, and with my knowledge of the surrounding areas, they usually sent me on errands.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...It took me a long time before they completely trusted me. So now, they've started assigning me the task of kidnapping people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As long as I could kidnap someone, I would have an excuse to come to the prison.

Options.PlotLineKey: So I was just an unfortunate victim kidnapped by you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, not exactly. Minghu told me to kidnap someone who's smart and strong. In that case, I would have a higher chance of escaping.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why he lent me this outfit and told me how to activate those devices.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So I found you! Someone who's smart and strong!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry to have involved you in this because of my advice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry. But I know where they hide my money and they put your weapons there too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll take you there to get your weapons back. Oh! And please take my money as compensation. Sorry to have you involved.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There we are! They have business to attend to, so no one's here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C'mon. Take your weapons.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh no! How come there are guards patrolling at this time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, no, no. They must've discovered that someone broke out from the prison!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Relax. Now that we have our weapons back, we don't need to fear them. Let's take them down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow! Impressive! With you two by my side, I don't need to fear the red-clothed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The path's clear. It's not safe to stay here. {PlayerName}, you'd better get out of here before they find out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We still have companions to save! That's why Minghu's here; he won't leave unless he saves those victims.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: eah, there have been several cases of residents disappearing in my jurisdiction. My subordinates investigating the cases also went missing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So I pretended to be tricked and made my way here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Minghu, hurry up. "Huzi" is waiting for us to save him!

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you sure you two can handle this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To be honest, it'll be a bit challenging, but it's still within our abilities.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, we don't want to further bother you with this issue. You were just unfortunately caught up in this thing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... {Male=he;Female=she}'s resilient. With {Male=him;Female=her} on our side, our chances of rescuing the kidnapped will significantly improve. And... I can't bear to lose my friends.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. Your help means a lot to me! There are hidden treasures here, and I'll lead you to their locations!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I really, really thank you for your help!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *snort* Compared to these red-clothed folks, Patrollers are nothing to fear!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My bad! My bosses used to say Patrollers are a bunch of fierce and ruthless guys stopping at nothing to achieve their ends.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But after staying with Minghu for a while, I realized they lied to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Minghu didn't treat me poorly just because I'm an Exile. He even showed me the ropes on gaining trust and where to investigate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, with {PlayerName} on board, our operation is bound to run smoother! We should be able to save them soon!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fengbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Patroller Minghu? Why are you here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm here to save you, of course.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jia'ming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Patroller! It's a Patroller! We're saved!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xiaojue!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maosan! Are you okay? What about Gousi?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm fine, but Gousi was taken away by those red-clothed people. Still no news from him...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry. We have Minghu and {PlayerName} here. We're bound to leave together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xiaojue took out the key he used before and tried to open the door but failed again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This darn key! Could they give me the wrong one?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fengbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dude, you probably don't know that the keys to these cell doors are carried by a junior leader.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fengbai, did you find out anything about that junior leader?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fengbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From what I've observed, the junior leader should be in the room next door at this time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good, we'll be back soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Another annoying mechanism! Why are they everywhere?

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps they hide something important ahead...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew, finally got the key. Just standing here gives me an uncomfortable feeling. Let's get out of here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait. Look at this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's an unexpected discovery.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So these apes were injected with something?

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, I'm afraid they were injected with the spore extract, which can control their behavior, making them bloodthirsty and aggressive.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And now, those red-clothed people probably want to use the spore extract on humans...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What! That's bad. We have to rescue them as quickly as possible!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jia'ming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you! Thank you so much for saving my life!

Dialogues.Speaker: Nianqiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. I thought I was going to end up in this dark prison...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder how Gousi's doing...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fengbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember the red-clothed took him upstairs.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, let's go up and save him!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fengbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mr. Minghu, I'll take care of things here. Please go up and save Gousi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fengbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If those red-clothed people come back, I'll protect them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, I'll leave this to you. Lead everyone to a safe spot near the entrance, and we'll join you after rescuing Gousi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gousi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: NO! Stay away from me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Gousi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't want to become a zombie or something!!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Gousi, are you okay?

Dialogues.Speaker: Gousi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank goodness you guys came in time! It's... it's too close. I don't want to be controlled like those apes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This place isn't safe. Let's get out of here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Gousi! You finally escaped! Are you alright?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's get out of here first, and we can talk later.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ambushing Man in Red
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you think you can come and go as you please?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You scammers kidnapped my friends, and I won't let you get away with it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Gousi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We won't let you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're safe for now. Let's hurry up and leave.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've already taken photos of crucial evidence, and the Patrol Station will send people to handle it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jia'ming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks to all of you, I'm still alive. From now on, I won't trust those "buy one get ten", "one lottery ticket for a Terminal", and "doing grocery shopping to earn a house" schemes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jia'ming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, I'll tell everyone in the neighborhood not to believe in these frauds!

Dialogues.Speaker: Nianqiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, Mr. Patroller and {PlayerName}. I'll try to find my Prince Charming in a genuine way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Nianqiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I know there's no handsome and rich boy with washboard abs who will buy me big rings without even meeting me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fengbai
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even if you meet each other, you shouldn't trust those sweet words easily! We'll regularly conduct anti-fraud campaigns. Feel free to join!

Dialogues.Speaker: Nianqiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, okay, I'll definitely go.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After we go back, I'll talk to the boss and make sure other companions are aware of these tricks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If we hadn't been so desperate for money to repair our camps, we wouldn't have fallen for this silly trick...

Dialogues.Speaker: Gousi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, don't you think this place looks good? There's a natural cave here. Plus, the red-clothed have left. We can make use of this cave. What do you think?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. Let's tell the boss when we're back. It might save us some money.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We owe this to {PlayerName}. We barely escaped with our lives. We need to let other companions know and show {Male=him;Female=her} respect when coming across {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}. Thank you for taking those bad guys down and saving our lives. I sent the coordinates of the treasures to your Terminal. Feel free to take them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe when we get rich, we won't be so easily fooled by these tricks...

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This one. Get in the car!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you were about to get in, a sudden dull pain hit the back of your head. Your consciousness gradually faded away, and you passed out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm here to save you, of course.

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Patroller! It's a Patroller! We're saved!

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xiaojue!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jia'ming
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, I'll tell everyone in the neighborhood not to believe in these frauds!

Dialogues.Speaker: Nianqiu

Dialogues.Speaker: Nianqiu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I know there's no handsome and rich boy with washboard abs who will buy me big rings without even meeting me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maosan

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, don't you think this place looks good? There's a natural cave here. Plus, the red-clothed have left. We can make use of this cave. What do you think?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. Let's tell the boss when we're back. It might save us some money.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maosan

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}. Thank you for taking those bad guys down and saving our lives. I sent the coordinates of the treasures to your Terminal. Feel free to take them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe when we get rich, we won't be so easily fooled by these tricks...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaojue
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are there so many people here? They're talking about all this weird stuff.

Dialogues.Speaker: Minghu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While they haven't noticed, let's take the initiative and get rid of them.
